IPAddressRule.description: Enter the IP address(es) where you want this employee to have access in the following formats:   1. A dotted decimal IP address such as 123.456.78.90   2. A range of IP addresses entered in dotted decimal with a dash and no spaces between such as 123.45.567.8-123.45.568.9   3. A list of IP address separated by spaces or commas such as 123.456.78.90, 123.546.768.97, . . .   4. An IP address and mask, such as 209.209.48.32/255.255.0.0.   5. The text "ALL" -- allows all IP addressesYou can enter up to 1024 characters.If you do not enter an IP Address here, you must check the Inherit IP Rules from Company box, or this employee will no longer be able to log in to NetSuite.
IPAddressRule.name: IPAddressRule

accountNumber.description: If you, your payroll service, or other benefits provider assigns account numbers to your employees, enter that account number here.This field is required for the Online Bill Pay feature.
accountNumber.name: accountNumber

altName.description: To update the internal ID of the Name field to altName, in the UI go to: 1. Setup > Company > Auto-Generated Numbers. 2. Enable auto-generated numbers for Employees, set Enable Override to TRUE, and then click Save. When you edit existing Employee records, the internal ID for the Name field becomes altName.
altName.name: altName

approvalLimit.description: Sets the amount of the largest expense report this supervisor can approve.
approvalLimit.name: approvalLimit

approver.externalId.description: References an employee record. Sets the person who approves the employees expense reports and purchase requests.If you have set a supervisor, you can NOT set an approver. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
approver.externalId.name: approver.externalId

approver.internalId.description: References an employee record. Sets the person who approves the employees expense reports and purchase requests.If you have set a supervisor, you can NOT set an approver. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
approver.internalId.name: approver.internalId

approver.name.description: References an employee record. Sets the person who approves the employees expense reports and purchase requests.If you have set a supervisor, you can NOT set an approver. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
approver.name.name: approver.name

baseWage.description: Enter the employee's base wage. Depending on the selected base wage type, enter the hourly, monthly, or yearly total.
baseWage.name: baseWage

baseWageType.value.description: Select whether the employee's base wage is calculated on an hourly, monthly, or yearly basis.
baseWageType.value.name: baseWageType.value

billPay.description: Check this box in order to send this employee payments online.You cannot use this feature for paychecks.You must follow the set up procedures at <_TABNAME=ADMI_XML_PAYTRUST_SETUP_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_XML_PAYTRUST_SETUP_> > Online Bill Pay before you can use this feature.
billPay.name: billPay

billingClass.externalId.description: In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
billingClass.externalId.name: billingClass.externalId

billingClass.internalId.description: In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

billingClass.name.name: billingClass.name

birthDate.description: Enter the employee's date of birth.You can type or pick another date.
birthDate.name: birthDate

comments.description: Enter other information you want to track for this employee.
comments.name: comments

commissionPaymentPreference.value.description: Select in the dropdown whether the payor for this employee's commissions always should be Payroll, always should be Accounts Payable, or should vary according to preferences set in the NetSuite system.
commissionPaymentPreference.value.name: commissionPaymentPreference.value

compensationCurrency.value.description: Select the currency for this employee's compensation.
compensationCurrency.value.name: compensationCurrency.value

concurrentWebServicesUser.description: This field appears only if the Web services feature is enabled in NetSuite.
concurrentWebServicesUser.name: concurrentWebServicesUser

currency.externalId.description: The currency for an employee automatically defaults to the base currency of the associated subsidiary or company. This currency must be used for transactions with this employee.
currency.externalId.name: currency.externalId

currency.internalId.description: The currency for an employee automatically defaults to the base currency of the associated subsidiary or company. This currency must be used for transactions with this employee.
currency.internalId.name: currency.internalId

currency.name.description: The currency for an employee automatically defaults to the base currency of the associated subsidiary or company. This currency must be used for transactions with this employee.
currency.name.name: currency.name

customForm.externalId.description: References an existing custom form for this record type. To ensure that field relationships defined within a desired custom form are maintained, you must provide the customForm value. Also, if defaults are off, then customForm is required, if defaults are on then the default form is used. Internal ID values for existing forms can be found at Setup > Customization > Entry Forms. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
customForm.externalId.name: customForm.externalId

customForm.internalId.description: References an existing custom form for this record type. To ensure that field relationships defined within a desired custom form are maintained, you must provide the customForm value. Also, if defaults are off, then customForm is required, if defaults are on then the default form is used. Internal ID values for existing forms can be found at Setup > Customization > Entry Forms. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
customForm.internalId.name: customForm.internalId

customForm.name.description: References an existing custom form for this record type. To ensure that field relationships defined within a desired custom form are maintained, you must provide the customForm value. Also, if defaults are off, then customForm is required, if defaults are on then the default form is used. Internal ID values for existing forms can be found at Setup > Customization > Entry Forms. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
customForm.name.name: customForm.name

defaultExpenseReportCurrency.externalId.displayName: Default Currency For {#Expense Reports#} - External id

This field is required when Make Departments Mandatory is enabled at Setup > Accounting > Accounting Preferences. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

directDeposit.description: Check this box to use Direct Deposit for transferring funds to an employee's bank account. Direct Deposit transactions take place over the Internet and in real time.These transactions have immediate accounting impact on your books. Payments you transmit are withdrawn from your company's bank account.
directDeposit.name: directDeposit

eligibleForCommission.description: Check the box to indicate this employee can be paid commission.
eligibleForCommission.name: eligibleForCommission

In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
employeeStatus.externalId.name: employeeStatus.externalId

employeeType.externalId.name: employeeType.externalId

employeeType.internalId.name: employeeType.internalId

employeeType.name.description: Choose the type of employee for tax reporting purposes.

entityId.description: If the Auto box is not checked, manually enter an ID for this record.If the Auto box is checked, NetSuite assigns an ID for this record based on your settings at <_TABNAME=ADMI_NUMBERING_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_NUMBERING_> > Auto-Generated Numbers.
entityId.name: entityId

ethnicity.externalId.description: Select the employee's ethnicity.You can create a new ethnicity category at <_TABNAME=EDIT_EMPOTHERLIST_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_EMPOTHERLIST_> > Employee Related Lists.
ethnicity.externalId.name: ethnicity.externalId

ethnicity.internalId.description: Select the employee's ethnicity.You can create a new ethnicity category at <_TABNAME=EDIT_EMPOTHERLIST_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_EMPOTHERLIST_> > Employee Related Lists.
ethnicity.internalId.name: ethnicity.internalId

ethnicity.name.name: ethnicity.name

expenseLimit.description: In the Expense Limit field, enter the amount this employee can expense without approval from a supervisor or approver.
expenseLimit.name: expenseLimit

fax.description: Enter a fax number for this record. You should enter the fax number exactly as it must be dialed. If a '1' is required to fax to this number, be sure to include it at the beginning of the number.The number you enter here automatically appears in the To Be Faxed field of transactions when you select this customer.To fax NetSuite forms, an administrator must first set up fax service at <_TABNAME=ADMI_PRINTING_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=ADMI_PRINTING_> > Printing, Fax & Email Preferences.
fax.name: fax

firstName.description: Required for Online Bill pay feature.
firstName.name: firstName

giveAccess.description: Check this box to give your employee access to NetSuite. Then, set a role to customize the level of access using the EmployeeRolesList field.
giveAccess.name: giveAccess

globalSubscriptionStatus.value.description: Email recipients can have one of four subscription statuses:    * Confirmed Opt-In - When an email recipient has indicated that they want to receive your campaign messages, they are assigned this subscription status. Only a recipient can set his or her subscription status to Confirmed Opt-In.    * Soft Opt-In - Recipients with this status can receive opt-in messages that enable them to confirm whether or not they want to receive your email campaigns as well as email marketing campaigns.      You can set a recipient’s status to Soft Opt-In manually or through a mass update.    * Soft Opt-Out - Recipients with this status cannot receive campaign email messages but can receive opt-in messages.      You can change this subscription status to Soft Opt-In manually or through a mass update.    * Confirmed Opt-Out - Only the recipient can set their subscription status to Confirmed Opt-Out.      Recipients with this status cannot receive email campaigns or opt-in messages. Recipients with this status can only opt in again through the Employee Center or by clicking the link in a campaign message they have received prior to opting out.
globalSubscriptionStatus.value.name: globalSubscriptionStatus.value

hasOfflineAccess.description: If set to True, the user is granted offline access privileges. The Offline Client for Sales feature must be enabled and your account must be provisioned for Offline Client for Sales in order for this field to be settable.
hasOfflineAccess.name: hasOfflineAccess

hireDate.description: Enter the date this employee was hired.You can type or pick another date.
hireDate.name: hireDate

homePhone.description: Enter this employee's home phone number here.
homePhone.name: homePhone

image.externalId.description: References an image file that has already been uploaded to the account. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
image.externalId.name: image.externalId

image.internalId.description: References an image file that has already been uploaded to the account. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

image.name.description: References an image file that has already been uploaded to the account. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

inheritIPRules.description: Check this box to allow this employee NetSuite login access at the IP addresses listed at Setup > Company Information.If you check this box, this employee has access to NetSuite at every company computer with access unless you specify IP address(es) in the IP Address Restriction field.If you do not check this box, you must enter an IP Address where this employee can log in in the field below, or this employee will not be able to log in to NetSuite.
inheritIPRules.displayName: Inherit Allowed IP Addresses from Company
inheritIPRules.name: inheritIPRules

initials.description: NetSuite automatically completes this field as you enter first, middle and last names.If you want to make changes to an employee's initials, enter up to three letters in this field.
initials.name: initials

isInactive.description: This field is false by default.
isInactive.name: isInactive

isJobResource.description: Set this field to TRUE so that this employee can be added as a resource on projects and tasks. Note that if this field is set to TRUE, the Work Calendar (workCalendar) field becomes a mandatory field.
isJobResource.name: isJobResource

isSalesRep.description: Check this box to mark this employee as a sales representative.Sales representatives are listed in the sales rep dropdown list for sales order forms and for sales territory assignments.
isSalesRep.name: isSalesRep

isSupportRep.description: Sets the employee as a Support Rep.
isSupportRep.name: isSupportRep

job.externalId.description: Select a job to assign to this employee.
job.externalId.name: job.externalId

job.internalId.description: Select a job to assign to this employee.
job.internalId.name: job.internalId

job.name.description: Select a job to assign to this employee.
job.name.name: job.name

jobDescription.description: Enter a description of the duties related to the job this person currently performs.
jobDescription.name: jobDescription

laborCost.description: Enter the employee's hourly overhead labor rate. This rate is used to calculate the estimated cost of jobs this employee works on.
laborCost.name: laborCost

lastName.description: Enter the employee's last name here.What you enter here automatically appears last in the Employee field. The first letter of what you enter here appears in the Initials field.This field is required for the Online Bill Pay feature.
lastName.name: lastName

lastPaidDate.description: Sets the last day this employee was paid. NetSuite automatically updates this whenever a new paycheck is generated.
lastPaidDate.name: lastPaidDate

lastReviewDate.description: Enter the date of this person's last salary evaluation.You can type or pick another date.
lastReviewDate.name: lastReviewDate

location.externalId.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.

maritalStatus.externalId.description: Select the employee's marital status.You can create a new marital status at <_TABNAME=EDIT_EMPOTHERLIST_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDIT_EMPOTHERLIST_> > Employee Related Lists.

middleName.description: Enter a middle name or initial here.What you enter here automatically appears second in the Employee field. The first letter of what you enter here appears in the Initials field.Enter up to 25 characters in this field.
middleName.name: middleName

mobilePhone.description: Phone numbers can be entered in the following formats:999-999-9999,  1-999-999-9999, (999) 999-9999, 1(999) 999-9999  or 999-999-9999 ext 9999
mobilePhone.name: mobilePhone

nextReviewDate.description: Enter the date of this person's next salary evaluation.You can type or pick another date.

officePhone.description: Phone numbers can be entered in the following formats:999-999-9999,  1-999-999-9999, (999) 999-9999, 1(999) 999-9999  or 999-999-9999 ext 9999

password.description: If this user has access multiple accounts, you can NOT submit a new password on an update. If attempted, the request will succeed but the password is not changed in the database.

password2.description: This field must match the value entered in password.
password2.name: password2

payFrequency.value.description: References a value in a system list.
payFrequency.value.name: payFrequency.value

phone.description: Phone numbers can be entered in the following formats: 999-999-9999,  1-999-999-9999, (999) 999-9999, 1(999) 999-9999  or 999-999-9999 ext 9999
phone.name: phone

phoneticName.description: Enter the furigana character you want to use to sort this record.
phoneticName.name: phoneticName

purchaseOrderApprovalLimit.description: In the Purchase Approval Limit field, enter the maximum amount an employee is allowed to approve on a purchase request when specified as an approver for an employee.
purchaseOrderApprovalLimit.name: purchaseOrderApprovalLimit

purchaseOrderApprover.externalId.description: In the Purchase Approver field, select the person that approves the employee’s purchase requests. If no approver is selected, the supervisor approves purchase requests. If a purchase approver is selected, the supervisor is no longer part of the approval hierarchy.
purchaseOrderApprover.externalId.name: purchaseOrderApprover.externalId

purchaseOrderApprover.internalId.description: In the Purchase Approver field, select the person that approves the employee’s purchase requests. If no approver is selected, the supervisor approves purchase requests. If a purchase approver is selected, the supervisor is no longer part of the approval hierarchy.
purchaseOrderApprover.internalId.name: purchaseOrderApprover.internalId

If no approver is selected, the supervisor approves purchase requests. If a purchase approver is selected, the supervisor is no longer part of the approval hierarchy.
purchaseOrderApprover.name.name: purchaseOrderApprover.name

purchaseOrderLimit.description: In the Purchase Limit field, enter the amount this employee can purchase without approval from a supervisor or approver.
purchaseOrderLimit.name: purchaseOrderLimit

releaseDate.description: Enter this person's last date of employment.You can type or pick another date.

requirePwdChange.description: If set to TRUE, the employee is required to change the default password assign on the next login attempt.

salesRole.externalId.description: Note that the Team Selling feature must be turned ON for this field to be available.
salesRole.externalId.name: salesRole.externalId

salesRole.internalId.name: salesRole.internalId

salesRole.name.description: Note that the Team Selling feature must be turned ON for this field to be available.
salesRole.name.name: salesRole.name

salutation.description: Enter an appropriate salutation for this employee.

sendEmail.description: If set to True, an email notification is automatically sent to this employee informing them of access privileges to NetSuite. The standard NetSuite email message also contains a link to let the user create a password. If set to false, the Manually Assign or Change Password field must be set to True. The administrator must create the password, and tell the user  the password, and when and how to log in.For security reasons, do not send the password by email.
sendEmail.name: sendEmail

socialSecurityNumber.description: Enter the social security number of this employee.
socialSecurityNumber.name: socialSecurityNumber

startDateTimeOffCalc.description: Enter the start date for the purpose of time-off calculations. The date entered here is used to calculate the number of days this employee is entitled to time-off, based on the minimum and maximum tenures set in the time-off plan. If there is no value specified in this field, this employee cannot be assigned a time-off plan.
startDateTimeOffCalc.name: startDateTimeOffCalc

subsidiary.externalId.description: Select the subsidiary to associate with this employee. You cannot enter transactions for this employee unless a subsidiary is assigned.If you select this employee on time transactions, the transaction is associated with this subsidiary. The employee is able to access only information associated with this subsidiary.Note: Once a transaction has posted for the employee, you are not able to change the subsidiary selected on the employee record.
subsidiary.externalId.name: subsidiary.externalId

subsidiary.internalId.description: Select the subsidiary to associate with this employee. You cannot enter transactions for this employee unless a subsidiary is assigned.If you select this employee on time transactions, the transaction is associated with this subsidiary. The employee is able to access only information associated with this subsidiary.Note: Once a transaction has posted for the employee, you are not able to change the subsidiary selected on the employee record.
subsidiary.internalId.name: subsidiary.internalId

The employee is able to access only information associated with this subsidiary.Note: Once a transaction has posted for the employee, you are not able to change the subsidiary selected on the employee record.
subsidiary.name.name: subsidiary.name

template.externalId.description: Use templates to enter data for employees quickly.To set up employee record templates, go to <_TABNAME=EDIT_EMPLOYEE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDITEMPLOYEE_> > Employees, and click New Template.
template.externalId.name: template.externalId

template.internalId.description: Use templates to enter data for employees quickly.To set up employee record templates, go to <_TABNAME=EDIT_EMPLOYEE_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=EDITEMPLOYEE_> > Employees, and click New Template.

template.name.name: template.name

terminationCategory.value.description: Select whether the termination is voluntary or involuntary. A voluntary termination indicates the employee ended their employment and an involuntary termination indicates the company ended the employment.
terminationCategory.value.name: terminationCategory.value

terminationReason.externalId.description: Select the reason for the termination. When the Termination Reason Tracking feature is enabled, NetSuite provides several default termination reasons, but you can change them or create your own.
terminationReason.externalId.name: terminationReason.externalId

terminationReason.internalId.description: Select the reason for the termination. When the Termination Reason Tracking feature is enabled, NetSuite provides several default termination reasons, but you can change them or create your own.
terminationReason.internalId.name: terminationReason.internalId

terminationReason.name.description: Select the reason for the termination. When the Termination Reason Tracking feature is enabled, NetSuite provides several default termination reasons, but you can change them or create your own.
terminationReason.name.name: terminationReason.name

terminationRegretted.value.description: Select whether or not the termination is regretted.A regretted termination indicates that the company regards the termination as a loss, meaning the employee was a high performer and an asset.A non-regretted termination indicates that the company does not see the termination as a loss. |If you do not want to track this information, select Unspecified
terminationRegretted.value.name: terminationRegretted.value

timeApprover.externalId.description: In the Time Approver field, select the person who approves the employee’s time transactions. If no time approver is selected, the employee’s supervisor approves time entries. If both a supervisor and a time approver are selected, then only the time approver can approve time entries using their Employee Center role.
timeApprover.externalId.name: timeApprover.externalId

timeApprover.internalId.description: In the Time Approver field, select the person who approves the employee’s time transactions. If no time approver is selected, the employee’s supervisor approves time entries. If both a supervisor and a time approver are selected, then only the time approver can approve time entries using their Employee Center role.
timeApprover.internalId.name: timeApprover.internalId

timeApprover.name.description: In the Time Approver field, select the person who approves the employee’s time transactions. If no time approver is selected, the employee’s supervisor approves time entries. If both a supervisor and a time approver are selected, then only the time approver can approve time entries using their Employee Center role.
timeApprover.name.name: timeApprover.name

timeOffPlan.externalId.description: Select the time-off plan to assign to this employee.

title.description: Enter this employee's official job title here.

type.value.description: References a value in a user-defined list at Setup > Company > Classifications > Locations. In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation. For more information, see getSelectValue of the Platform Guide.
type.value.name: type.value

usePerquest.description: Check this box if you want to include this employee in your pay runs.This employee will also be included in the Employee list on payroll forms and reports.
usePerquest.name: usePerquest

useTimeData.value.description: If enabled, the employee is paid for hours entered in NetSuite time transactions.
useTimeData.value.name: useTimeData.value

workAssignment.value.description: Select whether to assign a job or a position to this employee.
workAssignment.value.name: workAssignment.value

workCalendar.externalId.description: This field is mandatory if the Job Resource (isJobResource) field is set to TRUE.
workCalendar.externalId.name: workCalendar.externalId

workCalendar.internalId.description: This field is mandatory if the Job Resource (isJobResource) field is set to TRUE.
workCalendar.internalId.name: workCalendar.internalId

workCalendar.name.description: This field is mandatory if the Job Resource (isJobResource) field is set to TRUE.
workCalendar.name.name: workCalendar.name

workplace.externalId.description: Select the workplace where this employee works.The address of this workplace will be used to define the taxes you are required to withhold and pay for this employee.
workplace.externalId.name: workplace.externalId

workplace.internalId.description: Select the workplace where this employee works.The address of this workplace will be used to define the taxes you are required to withhold and pay for this employee.
workplace.internalId.name: workplace.internalId

workplace.name.description: Select the workplace where this employee works.The address of this workplace will be used to define the taxes you are required to withhold and pay for this employee.
